column5: I've been tying these crayfish waiting for bass to open so i can try them out.. Who know might be able to get a trout to take it too.
Dude that looks awesome! Bass will eat those up for sure! I don't even fly fish an I want some of those!
Yup,great lookin crawdad fly for sure. Mine don't look half as good as that one and I get plenty of bass so you should do alright...  Good Luck !
Simcoe perch would freakin love those at the right time of year!!  Bass.........what are those?  S.
Stellar.  If and when I get caught up with rod building I'll have to try tying some of those, if I recall Irishfield was asking for some.
YES I was Spiel.. yes I was!
Irishfield do you tie your own flies?
Nice ties, are you using furry foam for the body?  Dan
Absolutely not... why I've been bugging Spiel to make me some of those crayfish!!!  Wanna sell some....
yeah danny boy it is furry foam for the body...  Irishfield I could sell ya some!!
I'll take a couple dozen if you can tie them up !!
Naaaaa, he has enough problem with a zipper!
I can do that for ya Irishfield.. anyone else want any?
